text: is a Japanese footballer who plays as a midfielder. He was educated at and played for Withus Navi High School & Osaka Gakuin University before moving to Singapore in 2015.http://www.albirex.com.sg/ja/archives/17024/ He extended his contract in 2015 to play for 2016 after a successful 2015 season. ==Club career statistics== As of January 2, 2016 {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | League Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
